title: #197 - Eleanor Kerrigan & ME (phoner w/  Sean Evans from HOT ONES)
description:
Stand-up Comedian Eleanor Kerrigan & I hang out in the Mancave & talk about her time as a waitress at The Comedy Store, Freddy Soto, Joe Rogan, Carlos Mencia, growing up in Philly, working with Mitzi Shore, & getting into Stand-up.

Also Sean Evans the host of one of my favorite shows, Hot Ones on First We Feast, calls in to talk about the theft of his show's concept by Fox Sports Australia's, The 'Other" Rugby Show.

You can watch ME on Hot Ones Here:

https://youtu.be/1B9cdcjI2_U?list=PLAzrgbu8gEMIIK3r4Se1dOZWSZzUSadfZ 

& you can see the Fox Sports Australia show HERE:

https://youtu.be/EsB719OyoEc

You be the judge!
